title-part.text: OTHER DOMESTIC STOVES OR RANGES
DETAILS OF DOMESTIC STOVES OR RANGES, OF GENERAL APPLICATION

reference.text: radiator stoves of the fluid-circulating type F24H

title-part.text: Stoves or ranges in which the fuel or energy supply is not restricted to solid fuel or to a type covered by a single one of the following groups F24C3/00 to F24C9/00

adapted for the use of two or more kinds of fuel or energy supply
